snippet: American businesses increased hiring last month, led by strong gains in retail, finance and other service industries, a private survey found.
abstract: Payroll processor ADP releases report that shows American businesses added 217,000 jobs in November, highest number in five months.
lead_paragraph: American businesses increased hiring last month, led by strong gains in retail, finance and other service industries, a private survey found.

headline.main: U.S. Companies Added 217,000 Jobs, ADP Survey Finds
headline.print_headline: American Companies Added 217,000 Jobs, Adp Survey Finds
